level.heading: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF ASSISTANT TEACHERS (ยง 29-337)

level.text: The duties of each assistant teacher in a Child Development Center shall include the following:
Providing supervision and appropriate care to the children in his or her class or group, under the direct supervision of a teacher or the Center Director;
Assisting the teacher in planning the daily program of activities;
Assisting the teacher in regular communication with the parent(s) or guardian(s) of each child in his or her class or group about their children’s development; and
Attending in-service training programs and completing continuing education requirements, as required.
